statements: SELECT * FROM ParentTeacherCommunication;
SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, communication_date FROM ParentTeacherCommunication;
SELECT communication_method, communication_notes FROM ParentTeacherCommunication;
SELECT * FROM ParentTeacherCommunication WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ParentTeacherCommunication WHERE teacher_id = 2;
SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, communication_date, communication_method, communication_notes FROM ParentTeacherCommunication WHERE parent_id = 1 ORDER BY communication_date DESC, teacher_id ASC

SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, communication_date, communication_method FROM ParentTeacherCommunication WHERE teacher_id = 2 AND communication_method = 'Email' AND communication_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY communication_date DESC
SELECT communication_method, teacher_id, parent_id FROM ParentTeacherCommunication WHERE teacher_id > 3 AND parent_id < 5 ORDER BY teacher_id DESC, parent_id ASC, communication_method
SELECT * FROM ParentTeacherCommunication WHERE communication_method IN ('Phone', 'In-Person') ORDER BY parent_id ASC, communication_date DESC
SELECT parent_id, communication_method, communication_notes FROM ParentTeacherCommunication WHERE communication_notes LIKE '%help%' ORDER BY parent_id ASC, communication_date DESC
SELECT * FROM parent_communication;
SELECT teacher_id, parent_id, communication_date FROM parent_communication WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT communication_content FROM parent_communication WHERE teacher_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT teacher_id, progress_description, progress_date FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM parent_communication WHERE parent_id = 1
SELECT communication_date, communication_content FROM parent_communication WHERE teacher_id = 3
SELECT p.teacher_id, s.progress_description FROM parent_communication p JOIN student_progress s ON p.teacher_id = s.teacher_id
SELECT parent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM parent_communication GROUP BY parent_id
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM Parent_Communication;
SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, message FROM Parent_Communication ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT parent_id, message FROM Parent_Communication WHERE teacher_id = 'd4819d6b-2c19-4d9c-a196-eb8aa04b8b00';
SELECT teacher_name, experience_years FROM Teacher_Records WHERE department = 'Science';
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, email, phone_number FROM Parent_Records WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Parent_Communication ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, message FROM Parent_Communication WHERE teacher_id = 'abc123' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, phone_number FROM Parent_Records WHERE email LIKE '%gmail%' AND phone_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT teacher_name, department, experience_years FROM Teacher_Records ORDER BY experience_years DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parent_Records WHERE parent_id IN (SELECT parent_id FROM Parent_Communication WHERE teacher_id = 'xyz456');
SELECT * FROM Parent;
SELECT name, email FROM Student WHERE grade='A';
SELECT id, name, email FROM Teacher WHERE id=101;
SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, student_id, message FROM Communication ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM Parent WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Parent;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Teacher WHERE id = 3;

SELECT parent.name, student.name, communication.message FROM Parent AS parent INNER JOIN Communication AS communication ON parent.id = communication.parent_id INNER JOIN Student AS student ON communication.student_id = student.id;
SELECT * FROM Communication WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT teacher.name, student.grade FROM Teacher AS teacher INNER JOIN Student AS student ON teacher.id = student.id WHERE teacher.name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Parent;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parent ORDER BY parent_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM Student WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLog WHERE communication_type = 'Meeting' AND log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_date, communication_type FROM CommunicationLog ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT parent_name, email, phone_number FROM Parent LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Teacher WHERE teacher_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Student WHERE grade = 'A' AND student_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email' OR communication_type = 'Phone';
SELECT * FROM InteractionFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, feedback_id;
